scripts.start: dotenv -- node scripts/config-setup.js && cd .temp_custom_deps && npm install && cd .. && cross-env MIMIR_CFG_PATH=$INIT_CWD/.temp_custom_deps npm run internalStart
scripts.internalStart: npm run build && dotenv -- npm run start -w agent-mimir-cli
scripts.publish: bash scripts/release-branch.sh && turbo run build lint  &&  && npm workspace langchain run release && echo 'ðŸ”— Open https://github.com/Altaflux/agent-mimir/compare/release?expand=1 and merge the release PR'
